{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|make_tagged_tuple}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/tuple|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; TagSpecifier... Tags, class... Types &gt;
    requires sizeof...(Tags) == sizeof...(Types)
constexpr ranges::tagged&lt;/*see below*/, Tags...&gt; make_tagged_tuple( Types&amp;&amp;... t );
}}

Convenience function for creating a tagged tuple, deducing the element types from the arguments (the tag specifiers must be explicitly specified).

The ''see below'' portion of the return type is {{c|decltype(std::make_tuple(std::forward&lt;Types&gt;(t)...))}}.

===Return value===
{{c|R(std::forward&lt;Types&gt;(t)...)}}, where {{tt|R}} is the return type.
